channel.title: Shops making me mad!
channel.description:
Okay, I made shops. Followed all the rules. I am using a Silab server, and a talk only NPC here is what I have in Autospawn.cfg,Shops.cfg, and Client.java. My shops don't open when I click "Talk"
[code]spawn = 924 3440 2917 0 0 0 0 0 1 Osman [/code]
[code]shop = 41 Expirement 2 2 4708 100 4710 100 4712 100 4714 100 4716 100 4718 100 4720 100 4722 100 4724 100 4726 100 4728 100 4730 100 4732 100 4734 100 4736 100 4738 100 4745 100 4747 100 4749 100 4751 100 4753 100 4755 100 4757 100 4759 100 [/code]
[code]} else if (NPCID == 1917) { //Osman PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; //Expirement[/code]
I put the client part under Second Click Case....
anyone have an idea?

item.title: Shops making me mad!
item.dc:creator: @Blex Blex
item.description:
@Blex wrote:

What? I dont have that, only shop in first click is

} else if (NPCID == 1315) { // Agnar Food Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 30; //Aubury Magic Shop }

Read full topic

item.title: Shops making me mad!
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

I had same problem and I went into first click npc

search this in client.java //first click npc

Scroll down to the bottom and you will see similiar to this… else if (NPCID == 1552) { // Santa's Holiday Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 39; //Santa's Shop }

I little shop I added to a talk npc that fixed the same exact problem your having…You just copy n paste an already made command and fill in your own jive jinx

Read full topic

object click two = the trade option
first is talk
no such thing as a silab server…
